text: qal allah taealaa leysa ealayh alslam yawm alqyamt: hdha yawm aljaza' aldhy yanfae almwhdyn twhydhm rbhm, wanqyadhm lshreh, wsdqhm fi nyathm waqwalhm waemalhm, lahum janaat tajri min taht qswrha alanhar, maakithin fiha abdana, radi allah eanhum fqbl hsnathm, waraduu eanh bima aetahm min jazil thwabh. dhlk aljaza' walrda minh ealayhim hu alfawz alezym
